title: How to Open an ISO File in Windows Using UltraISO

steps.title: Download UltraISO at http://www.ezbsystems.com/ultraiso then install it.
steps.content: Download UltraISO at http://www.ezbsystems.com/ultraiso then install it. If you already have it, then move on to the next step.

steps.title: Wait until it is done installing, open UltraISO by clicking the shortcut on the desktop, or go to start, all programs, UltraISO, and UltraISO.
steps.content: Wait until it is done installing, open UltraISO by clicking the shortcut on the desktop, or go to start, all programs, UltraISO, and UltraISO.

steps.title: If it asks you to register, just click continue.
steps.content: If it asks you to register, just click continue.

steps.title: Go to the file menu, and click open.
steps.content: Go to the file menu, and click open.

steps.title: Locate the ISO file, if it on the desktop, then go to desktop.
steps.content: Locate the ISO file, if it on the desktop, then go to desktop. You get the idea.

steps.title: Click the ISO file, then click open.
steps.content: Click the ISO file, then click open.
